QuestData.Title: Hostile Skies
QuestData.Description: We're about to get hit hard... $B$BPick up that cannon there and lend a hand, if you would. There will be no shortage of targets.
QuestData.LogDescription: Shoot down 50 Kor'thik Swarmers and Voress'thalik.
QuestData.RewardText: Excellent shooting!$B$BI'm pretty sure that big bug survived the fall though...
